# StreamVox Pro

> The ultimate real-time AI translator for Windows.

## Overview
StreamVox is a Windows application that provides low-latency, real-time subtitles and translation for any audio source on your PC. It works with Zoom, Teams, Discord, movies, and Twitch streams.

## Key Features
- **Real-time Translation**: Instant subtitles for any audio.
- **Smart Overlay**: Transparent window that floats over games and movies.
- **Mobile Integration**: Translates phone calls via Microsoft Phone Link.
- **Privacy Focused**: Transient processing; no audio storage.
- **Pricing**: Free Starter plan (30 mins/day) and Pro plan ($5.99/month, unlimited).

## Download
Official download link: https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9NC10103JH7L

## Technical Details
- **OS**: Windows 10, Windows 11
- **Technology**: Native Windows App + AI Cloud Backend
- **Developer**: AlekGir

## Support
Contact: hello@alekgir.com
